entry.tran: （通过电击使心脏恢复正常跳动的）除颤器
entry.def: A defibrillator is a machine that starts the heart beating normally again after a heart attack, by giving it an electric shock.

means.word_mean: 1. an electronic device that administers an electric shock of preset voltage to the heart through the chest wall in an attempt to restore the normal rhythm of the heart during ventricular fibrillation
